SELECT i.itemId, i.quantity, i.sum, h.orderCode,
pd.productCode, pd.productName, pd.productType, pd.unit, pd.price,
i.finalPrice
FROM Order_item i LEFT JOIN Order_header h ON h.orderId = i.orderId LEFT JOIN Product pd ON pd.productCode = i.productCode
WHERE h.orderCode = #{orderCode }
